1612600.name: Rising Hell - Digital Artbook
1612600.description:
Rising Hell - Digital Artbook

Concept art and original artwork from Rising Hell.

DLC Content
This DLC package contains Rising Hell - Digital Artbook. A digital PDF artbook containing original artwork and concept art from the game Rising Hell.

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading Rising Hell - Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Rising Hell and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Rising Hell's game directory, which has the Artbook folder included in it.
